chunk:
Plant Therapy Hydrosol, Tea Tree

Brand: Plant Therapy

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Water*, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Aqua (Water)

Directions: To help calm irritated, dry, or itchy skin, spray the hydosol directly onto the area(s) of concern or soak a cotton round or clean cloth in

d or clean cloth in the hydrosol and apply where needed. Remove makeup or clean skin by first massaging your favorite carrier oil gently onto your face. Add the hydrosol to a cotton round and wipe away the oil, makeup, and other impurities, while helping to refresh and tone.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Development
oxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
